item.title: Happy Holidays from ARS - Appliance Repair Service - Toronto and GTA
item.description: Please note we will be closed from Dec. 24 - Dec. 28, 2020, 8am. Warmest Thoughts and Best Wishes for a Safe and Happy Holiday and a very Happy New Year from all us at ARS Appliance Repair Service. Enjoy these coupons on us!
